info.name: change background color to teal
info.description: change tumblr background color to teal.

style.css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);                                @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')   {                  body {            background: url('http://i46.tinypic.com/2u54c9j.png')  center left #87c4d3 repeat fixed !important;          } }
